content.detailedDescription: I was geting ready for bed.   i heard it `istill cant beleve it.I have video proof to show  it . ive been an out field night watcher for a while.  but i dont want to be the one that say. with my finger i seen it right there. i have some real footage that the world. would pobbile crap.If intrese
content.summary: Small but fast

content.detailedDescription: Driving early morning from vancouver bc to calgary ab.Through yoho national park my wife told me to pull off the road so the bright lights could pass us.She saw it first when i pulled over.However, my car died, no lights,no radio.We were motionless for about 5 min. as it hovered and shone a single light on the face of one mtn. then to a second face, then a third. then it spread the beam of light over all three faces at once.After focussing for awhile it turned off the beam and ascended and gone in split second. the sky was cloudless full moon. the ufo had the shape of a cigar about the size of 2 footballfields and hovered approx. 500feet from the ground ,one half mile(approx.)away from us at a 60 degree angle on passenger side of me.My wife at the time were scared stiff for we had our infant daughter sleeping in the back seat.As it descended it affected my auto by shutting it down. i didn't even turn the car off. when it ascended and out of sight, the car started up without me turning the key. once in calgary, phoned the observatory to report. they got both our statements and said if they hear anymore from that area they would be in touch no calls.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo descended ,hovered,shon abeam of light on mtn face, 3 times . shut off light and ascended faster than a blink.My car thenstarted up without turning key.

content.detailedDescription:
I had an out patient surgey that morning. by night i was very sore (back injury), and asked my roommate to take my dogs out before he went to bed, he didn't. about 2:15am my dogs woke me up, it took me ten minutes to get out of bed and get dressed. as we walked in front of the house i noticed the moon towards the south, then something in the west caught my attention. 

eight objects, shaped like ameba's glowing orange, just over the spring mtns. they were side by side like they were racing, jockeying for position. they slowly gained altitude as they raced towards the east and went out of sight. 

i never heard a thing on the news and didn't know who to talk to about it until i saw a show on cable tonight on ufon.
content.summary: Observed 8 ameba shapped objects, side-by-sdie, like they were racing, jockeying posistions, always two by two.

content.detailedDescription: Medicine hat alberta, about 8:15pm first week of november 2010, city center, a thin boomerang shaped object about 70 ft in the air directly over my head, above the trees, was quiet, but somehow got my attention. the color of this object was so dark, the same color of the night sky, only it blocked out the stars light, as to see the faint shape but no detail except the two lights. on the "right wing" at the tip was a small white light and a faint red light on the tip of the "left wing" this crafts "nose" was pointed my direction. the white light got brighter, the craft started to move from left to right, not turning, as if it was looking at me while it faded away, about the size of a small airplane, no sound, no trail, then disappeared over a condo building. i waited around to maybe hear something, see it return but nothing. initially i though it was a plane, until i heard an eerie silence for how close this object was and the way it flew, there is a military base 20 minutes from the city (maybe about 40 from where this happened) and i am aware of certain aircraft that move differently with very minimal sound, which is why i called my father who was in this military, told him what i saw, and he said " you probably just saw a jet or plane too high up to hear it". i left the conversation there as to not look like " i'm starting to believe silly things", but in all seriousness, never had such a stunning moment, where i literally stopped walking and seen something that big hovering over me, flying unusually, soundless and gone in less than 2 minuites.
content.summary: One white light on one side, red light on the other side, no light on nose, moved left to right(red to white)very close no sound

content.detailedDescription: I turned onto carroll st. nw in champion, ohio off of old state rd. enroute to my destination. as i rounded the first bend, right above the tree line were three bright white lights in a triangular shape. i said aloud to myself "what is that? what is that?!" to which my passenger replied, "i was just about to say that!"  we had traveled down this dead end road many times before, and had never seen this! i continued on the side road around the next bend; the object remained hovering in place with it's three large lights about two to three blocks away.  there was no sound (i had my window cracked open). i slowed the car down and told my passenger to get out the phone and take a picture to which they replied "no! i'm freaked out!"  i stopped the car and put it in reverse. as i inched my way backward, the object dimmed the three lights until they faded and changed into six small bright white lights, still in the same triangular shape and it headed north very slowly among the treeline.  i continued on to our destination just  four houses away, no more than 200-300 ft., my passenger jumped out as soon as i pulled into the drive and ran to the house yelling "i'll call you later!" i backed out of the driveway and was still faintly able to see the lights between the trees on the bend. i headed back down carroll st. around the bends. however, i was unable to keep sight of the object as i had to drive west before i was able to return to driving east or north. i turned east onto old state rd. until i came to st rt. 45 in champion. i continued to head north on st. rt. 45 until i reached 305, before heading home. there was nothing in the sky above the houses or trees that even remotely looked like the object. there was one plane in the air that i could see at this time but was very high in altitude and moving along the basic flight paths. this incident transpired between 5:50pm and 6:00pm on november 17, 2011.
content.summary: Triangular craft, 3 large white lights that dimmed to 6 smaller lights before moving from hovering postion.

content.detailedDescription:
I was working night security at the diamond lake resv. in hemet and was looking up at the night sky, as was my habit nightly. i was sweeping the sky using my high power binoculars, when i saw something dark, blotting out the stars, moving north to south about 30-40 degrees above the horizon, as i looked east. i am a very experienced person at night, as i have always been a graveyard person and out at night. i had been working security for about 2-3 years by this time and used binoculars on a nightly basis, while sitting in the dark at various locations. 
     i just happened to sweep my binoculars south to north when something dark caught my eye, moving south. i quickly swept south and caught up with the dark object and followed it as it moved south almost directly in front of me from quite a distance away. it stopped just to the right of center and then 3 lights came on and i realized there were 3 of them, triangle shaped, with the tips of the triangle pointing up, long sides with a somewhat narrow bottom.  
     each full triangle was completely lit up (white light) and they were all three in a triangle formation, one at the top, one bottom left, one bottom right. as i watched all 3 of them, at exactly the same time, they did 3 rotations to the right at about 1 to 1.5 seconds per rotation, finishing in the straight up position(s) they started in, then stopped for a second and then did 3 rotations to the left at about 1 to 1.5 seconds per rotation. again ending the 3 rotations in the straight up position. it was like they were each pinned in the middle, as there was only a rotation, no movement up down, left right, no wobble. they just turned 360 degrees, 3 times right, three times left. then stopped for a second or so and then all 3 lit up triangles, pulsed 3 times in unison and then in a second or two, all 3 went dark at exactly the same time and immediately moved off quickly. one went north, one south and one straight up. i again was able to find and track the one headed north, but lost it in a few seconds among the stars. i could not find or track the other two.
     i should add that when i first saw this craft, blacked out moving south, i figured it was some kind of aircraft, not a ufo. as i tracked it, i saw no lights until all 3 came together in the triangle formation described. i was pretty well shock for the rest of the night, as i have never seen anything like this before (or after!) vance h. seibert
content.summary: Flying north to south, met two others formed triangle rotated 3 times right, 3 times left, pulsed 3 times pulsed 3 times

content.detailedDescription: Light that has been in the sky for several weeks now moves in every direction even out of way for airplanes thought it was a star then a satelite but when it moved the other night for a airplane i knew something was up
content.summary: Light that moves every direction eben out of the way for planes

content.detailedDescription:
What i witnesed was an unusual high level of military aircraft in the area. the sounds of these aircraft were not the the usual/standard practice landings that we see/hear so frequently in the battle creek area. what i heard was a low level, engagement activity in my area. this was no practice activity, the military aircraft were after something, and moving very fast. what i would describe as the enitial engagement lasted about two minutes... then i went outside, and heard the "enagement" for another 4-5 minutes or so.


i can only say that i've grown up with the battle creek air show, and the air force's thunderbirds. what i heard tonight was now excercize... there were clearle fighters chasing something very fast, and the engagement lasted about five minutes from my perspective.

hopefully this report can give creedence to similar reports in the area tonight.
content.summary: What sounded like a military/ ufo engagement

content.detailedDescription: It was about 11 at night.  my best friend and i were riding on the highway in his truck just going south of ________ on highway __.  the highway is two lane, rural, almost completely flat, and is surrounded by cornfields.  we were going to go down to _______ to visit an abandoned house to see if we could witness anymore orbs as previously done there before.  my friends had witnessed triangular craft fly right over them at this house previously also, so we had suspicions of what we might expect.  it was nearly completely dark this night because of the moonless winter night. we had just departed from the outskirts of __________ when it rode up right next to us on the highway.  it was 5 feet away from the drivers side of the truck, and was about 25 feet long.   it was only about 10 to 12 feet high with steep tetrahedral edges and it took up the entire other half of the road as it road next to us.  it was completely silent keeping in stride with us on the highway for about a half mile.  we just sat there completely silent smoking cigarettes as it watched us. for the half mile that it rode by us, it's bottom was at about tire height to the truck so we could not see the undercarriage of it until if pulled away from us departing into a cornfield while raising its side nearest to us.  the undercarriage had 3 small "orbs" located by its tips of the triangular bottom, and had on large "orb" centered in the middle of the craft.  the "orbs" were spherical and emitted no color other than the small amounts of ionized oxygen and nitrogen. we were not afraid at all, surprisingly, but the radio that was quietly on in the car received only static while the craft was near the car.  we now have reason to suspect that the beings inside the craft had/have something to do with the abandoned house because of the previous occurrences there(which i was not a part of), but that is purely based on speculation.
content.summary: Tetrahedral. pitch black.

content.detailedDescription: On november 17, at about 7:15 pm, i was driving west on us 50 towards versailles, in.  as i was leaving the area of elrod, i saw through the leafless treetops, in a west/southwest direction, some lights.  my first thought was "fireworks" because they lit up, lasted 4-5 seconds, then went away.  and seeing them through the trees gave them that "sparkling" effect.  further down the highway i saw the lights again, only it was clear sky, no trees close by.  this time i thought "ufo." i turned left on a side road toward home that goes straight south for a couple of miles.  there are a lot of fields interspersed with groves of trees. here i had a clearer line of sight to my right through the passenger window of my car.  since i was driving on a narrow road with no shoulders to pull off, i had to keep glancing at the road and then to the sky on the right while trying to avoid an oncoming car plus the one that was riding my bumper because i was going so slow.  one second i was seeing nothing, then suddenly, at about 15 degrees up from the horizon, i would glance to see a double row of lights, about 8-10 per row, that was slightly tilted.  in another glance it would be gone.  i heard nothing at the time since my car windows were closed.  the bar of lights was about the width of a quarter if my arm was extended out.  also, at about an index finger length away were at least 4-6 aircraft(possibly helicopters?) surrounding the ufo, of which only a strobe-like white light was seen, no sound as they seemed very high up.  by the time i reached my driveway about 7 minutes later, the ufo was disappearing beyond the trees because the road had become hilly.  i could still see a couple of the strobe-like white lights pacing it as it went further south out of my area.  in all, i estimated that i saw the lights go on about 12 times.
content.summary: Saw double row of lights going on and off, slighted tilted, in wsw while driving west towards versailles on us 50 about 7:15 pm

content.detailedDescription: Game camera on rural farmland caught three frames of an object moving from north to south descending. three frames over 39 seconds catches the light in three positions from upper right to left of center, flaring brightly on the final frame and well below the treeline. (note:the constant light on the center left is the light from a farmhouse about 3/4 mile away) the final frame convinces me that this light is not from a aircraft due to it being below the treeline either landing or hovering very close to the ground. the next picture is taken (tripped again by deer) 30 minutes later and the light is gone.
content.summary: Strange light descending on game camera.

content.detailedDescription: Previously reported to mufon-new england..From [name removed/cms/tg] ].Ex-private investigator,(me)report known as "[title removed/cms/tg]",as yet unpublished..Seeking film production...Trying to convince [name removed/cms/tg],here in new zealand, to produce something that is factual...There are precursers that happened leading up to this event...6may,1991,1055hs.It`s a fine sunny clear crisp morning,about to start mowing a lawn,part time job..Travelled to totara park,tiny working class settlement,circa 20miles north of the capital,wellington.About to pull the start cord...As i leaned over,astounded to see a very high altitude "clear,silvery-edged "goo"oozing across the clear blue sky from the east"the edges not disipating or reforming as a cloud would do.It is travelling at about the speed of an airliner at circa 35.000ft-east to west...I estimate that this in total covers at least 50miles long/20miles wide...Looks totaly foriegn in physics to exist&behave within the atmosphere like that...I watch as it finaly passes overhead to the west,slightly luminescent,very,very high..But i can see it glowing through some fluffy cumulous clouds 50miles out west,over the coast...Oh well,never seen anything before like that...Now back to this lawn...And then,as i turned back facing the east,a dirty orange/sulphur yellow small rapidly tornado-like vertical cloud,is starting to form,circa half-mile from me,500ft alt...Getting bigger by the second...Tight black/gunmeatal volcanic-like swirls,are boiling up from,&around the bottom of it`s circumference...I hope this things not toxic,because it`s heading straight for me..By now,the "cloud"has grown to 3miles across...No noise,no wind...The edge has passed overhead..I look west,completely clear..Bright sunny sky!..But then i look back..Before me to the east...A huge,massive,slowly revolving flat disc..No more than 500ft.Ht.The edge has stopped right on top of me..Look..5-6 small tadpole/spermlike long tailed lights are slowly revolving counterclockwise,they are silver/leadend gray,within the blue/gray foggy mist of the underside..I take a look west again for a reality-check..Yep..Still bright&sunny out there..I turn back,crane my head back,whoa..Look at that!!!...I`m looking up the side of what looks like a gigantic auto engine electrical cap...Complete with high tension outlet lobes..Exept this one`s 3-5miles high.3-4miles wide..Perfectly stationary..A real light absorbing,but solid looking glacier blue,leaden highlighting on the lobes..The underside is still slowly turning...I notice that it`s getting cooler now..This thing now covers most of the flat area of the valley floor..I can see looking under it out to the north,that it is lower than the low hills about 2 miles distant,sun shining brightly,i sense that i am within the shadow of it.I refocus back to the almost vertical side of the "auto cap"...Time elapsed:est.4minutes...Then..Uh oh,a black/silvery area on one of the lobes,starts to twitch&wriggle like a 200ft wide saucespan of milk abut to boil...Out erupts a thick oily jet black "smoke"..Searching the surface like probing fingers...Suddenly,a"mechanicaly"prescise retina leadened coloured muscle(s) opens..300ft dia....!!!!Something is starting to emerge from the opening..It`s a penis!!!!What...Is this some kind of spectacular joke??...Oh no,it`s not..."it`s" extending out toword me..Now 1mle long...Still coming out of the opening...It`s...A huge cobra-style prehistoric reptile..No visible mouth..Coal black....But oh,those haunting eyes...300ft dia.,ice hocky puc flat side mounted,bottomless hypnotic black pools.....Before the rest of the ordeal is released,mufon is advised to view the following sites:view "cloaked ufo italy"youtube(streetview)....&"suff ufo"kumbugas,turkey...I have identified these as of the same as my continuing nightmare...To be continued,when you are ready....
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 6.05.91-1100hs.H/a goo streem-3ml.Dia cloud-limpetshell 3ml.Ht.-snake&co emerge-burns+nueral contact-dept circa 1120hs.

content.detailedDescription: While driving south on wilma rudolph blvd, a shiny object caught my eye during a traffic delay. i thought the object might be an aircraft reflecting light so i waited for it to turn at an angle where it would stop reflecting and move in front of the cloud where i noticed it. however it just stopped reflecting and no apparent aircraft was visible or seen moving in any direction. then after less than a minute it reappeared in the same spot. it appeared to be in the southwest part of our county near hwy 48/13. i texted a couple of my freinds to see if they could see the object but they were hunting and had not noticed the object. im former military with aviation background and a mufon member. its my first sighting of an object that i couldnt explain. i remain objective in my sighting and hope someone else had gotten a better veiw of this object.
content.summary: Stationary reflective object that disappeared and reappeared for a short period

content.detailedDescription:
Was looking for reported enid-falling stars, and noticed a bright light moving from the southwest heading northeast. as it moved overhead i noticed it was as bright as the north star and was moving in a straight line. it was traveling as fast as a jet plane and i noticed that there were no blinking "strobes" as you would expect to see on jetliners. so as it passed by i expected to hear the noise of the jet engines, there was none. it was very quiet outside with no wind blowing.
this being strange to me i picked up my binoculars and focused on the object as it was moving away and all i could see was the light itself,
i didn't see any wings or outside structures just a bright light, even with the binoculars still didn't see any strobes blinking to clarify
that it was a plane. i watched it for a few minutes as it moved out of the area, never heard any sound. i didn't see any other air traffic at the time i sighted the object. i have seen aircraft flying through all the time and could easily identify jetliners and small planes because of the blinking  lights, and this was very unusual to me because i couldn't identify what it was with the binoculars, and the fact there was no sound.
content.summary: Starlike with no sound throughout sighting.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i stopped south of fulton, ny for a nature call.
i looked into the sky and saw an organge cigar shaped object moving slowly from the north.

the object stopped and a piece of the same color fell from it and burst into flames.

the object then left in the same direction it came from.

when i first saw it i said to my friend "look at this thing." my friend blew it off as nothing. i talked to him about 25 years ago (as he moved to califonia) and he still didn't think it was anything strange.

i was really excited and couldn't take my eyes off it.

we lost sight of it when it moved away and went behind some trees that were on our left.


i emailed skeptic magazine about 2 years ago and they told me it was a flair. but flairs ignite and the piece the fell from the object burst into flames and extinguished in a matter of seconds.

still remember this like it happened yesterday.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange cigar shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was in my boyfriend's backyard near martinsburg, west virginia. i was taking pictures of the sky simply because it was a very beautiful blue. i had also been taking pictures of birds that were flying by. 
2. i didn't see the object with my eyes but, when i uploaded the pictures i took, i realized that there was some weird object in one of the pictures. 
3. when i first saw the object in the photograph i thought that it could possibly be a bird. however, there aren't any white birds in this area (except seagulls and i never saw a seagull) and the birds that were flying around the area around that time were plainly black and turning up as such in my other photos. i knew the object could not be a plane because i distinctly remember that there were no planes in the sky when i took the particular photo with the ufo in it. 
4. i'm not sure what the object was doing because i didn't see it myself until i saw the picture. 
5. i am curious about what turned up in the photograph i took. it may not be something out of the ordinary but i can't seem to think of what it could be because of the odd shape and bright coloration of the object. 
6. i never gained or lost sight because i never saw it. 

for those interested, i posted the picture as an attachment. the object is on the right side of the photograph. the picture was not altered in any way before i attached it.
content.summary: Ufo in picture; didn't see myself but it turned up in a photo i took of the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the front porch and looked up and this triangle was coming toward my house from the north to the south. it slowly passed overhead and almost hit the antenna on the roof. when it passed i went to the back yard to watch it some more but it was no where to be seen. i first noticed that a shadow was coming by and thought it was clouds at first. it was triangular that was pointing south. it maid no noise and slowly crossed the house. 
it made me feel tingly and light headed. i lost site of it when it went straight up and disappeared.
content.summary: Triangle with windows on front two sides and six lights on the back side.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking a dog in a field outside of greenville, nc, off of doc loftin road.  clear blue sky overhead, you could see many planes on the horizon with contrails.  suddenly overhead i noticed a cigar/cylinder shaped plane without wings flying by.  it looked to be divided in the middle or maybe segmented into two sections.  it flew in a completely straight line just above the treeline, no arc or curve of ascent at all.  i watched it fly directly over me and into the horizon.  when it got just near out of my sight the sun hit it and the light reflecting off of it made it appear like a star.  there were no clouds overhead and i had been watching buzzards flying circles just to my right when the motion of it caught my eye.  totally silent, no contrail or exhaust, nothing.  very fluid, straight line motion.  i watched it for 10 minutes until it went too far away.  no ascent or descent - it was about the distance that the crop-dusters fly overhead.
content.summary: Cylinder shaped craft flew straight path without sound

content.detailedDescription:
Two families,about 10 or more persons can see the object fliyng at low altitud,we are preparing allthings for receive the happy new year,and sudenly appear in the horizont the object,i haved enough time for take my old videocassette camera and start to film the object.The enterely town can see the phenomenum..And several days later was in the local news paper.
was on 31 december 1198 at 11: 47 p.M. in mesa cavacas town near from guanare _ portuguesa  in venezuela.
content.summary: Object with lineal and very long flame trail,lying without noise

content.detailedDescription:
At about 3:30am, my puppy was scratching at the door to go out. i put on my shoes and took her out, as i walked off my front porch and began to turn toward my yard, i seen a bright light. the second i noticed it, i jerked my head around. that's when it let off a bright flash, almost camera like, and flew off leaving a trail a lot like a shooting star.

at first i thought i was seeing things, but my puppy was also staring in the sky whining. we do have a lot of police and news helicopters through the area, so at first i thought it could have been that. but it was completely stationary when it caught my attention, and bolted off at a speed i've only seen jets achieve. 

i am completely bummed that for once, i didn't have my phone on me. it was definitely worth seeing.
content.summary: Light still in sky, followed by flash and flew off.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of 11/3/2011,my wife came home stated that she had seen a ufo when driving home from her friends house. so i stepped outside to see if i could catch a glimpse of what she might have seen.My wife told me she saw it to the west so i wasn't out there for a minute and then i saw the following saw one, then two, then three and the fire like lights all blinked out at once. then we saw three again much further to the west. they also blinked out at the same time. then we saw one light appear,then two,three,four, five,six and seven until there were seven. the lights at first looked like flares but flares don't jump over in a straight line and then jump again. you could see the jump as it left a kind of trail. then my wife went in side when we saw no more activity and,i stayed outside for a bit longer and saw white light slowly move across the sky under the moon moving south west direction i ran to get my wife and in 2 sec i ran to get her the object was gone.
content.summary: Fireball like lights turning on then off over the gulf of mexico

content.detailedDescription:
We were standing in the driveway observing stars at approximately 10:00-10:15 on november 17, 2011.  when in a straight line there were 6-10 flying objects moving in a line on a slant.  they then changed direction of the slant, then  they formed a v - the entire time moving across the sky.  there was not any sounds 

at first i was shocked then my friend saw them too and we watched them until they flew out of sight saying to one another what was that did we just sew a ufo?

the configuration eventually flew out of sight
content.summary: Appeared to be v-shaped 6-8 objects that moved in a straight line then formed a v

content.detailedDescription: It started in october when we saw a light pass from the south to the east. i reported to another ufo site.  after that we started watching and i got my binoculars, and we watched what looks like planes but pass right over us and you can not hear a sound, you can hear the planes but not these.  they seem to follow the same path every night.  me and my husband went and parked by a open field to see if we could see better and they were all around the area, blinking to each other.  i also check the plane radar and it shows no planes around. when they do pass over, i cant see that well it kind of looks like it is just a stick with lights on it flashing i cant see a tail or any thing else.  when they pass over all the dogs in the neighborhood go crazy barking.  but we don't hear anything.  we live in a rural area.  its like they meet around here then go fly off.  when we went to the store you can see them hovering around open pastures.  i get very anxious when i see them, but it's exciting.  we usually loose sight when they fly out of range.  last night last night we saw one that was not blinking at all, fly above the tree tops, then flew behing the trees and we lost sight.  there are powerlines across the street over where the dogs bark.  i don't have a camera that i can get a picture with, i cant fing them on the screen.  my husband has his camera and is trying to figure out how to work it, so maybe we can come up with something. i am not sure what they are and what is going on, but i would like to know, i am afraid to go out side alone now.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looks like air planes, but theres  probably 5 to 10 every night that make no noise.

content.detailedDescription: My son witnessed this and i reported it annonymously last year. we were watching "ufos over illinois" and what they described is what he saw. he got really excited and started telling me that this was what he saw. he was with a friend outside and the vehicle hovered above them right over the tree tops and then left quickly. the rest of us were in the house at the time and there were issues w/the electronics going crazy and shutting off. he said there were lights that appeared right before the object appeared and it was like the dell logo and then it appeared. we are near an army base, so who knows what this is, although we have witnessed several other incidents in this area at different locations as well.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: My son saw it, it was triangular/chevron shape w/lights at the corner and a red light in the middle.

content.detailedDescription: Me & my friend sam was getting out of the car walking to the rec to go play basketball. while walking i seen the object from the side of my eye then i did a double take and it was gone. i didnt say anything about it to sam because i thought i was tripping. then he said "oh shit" then isaid "did you see that too" ? and we just kept talking about it because weve never seen an image like that or object like that before. sam said he noticed the object because he was twisting his dreads and he seen it. the first thing i thought it was was a ufo automatically. it couldnt have been nothing else then i searched on google el paso ufo and we seen the same stuff. sam said he seen it go into 3 different pieces. the only thing we remember is seeing the light glow and leave so fast , and it didnt leave a trail so it wasnt a shooting start or nothing. my feelings was like did i really see that or was i just tripping , i was thinking about it all night and i even told my teacher and she told me to report it , i reacted so fast to it because it happened so fast. i lost sight of the object because i turned away then turned back to the object in less then a tenth of a second then it was gone and me and sam was just talking about that the whole day.
content.summary: Really really bright , shaped like a sphere, sort of like a disc.. dissapered in less than one tenth of a second

content.detailedDescription: At around 7:20pm on november 17th southeast of deputy, indiana i stepped outside of my house and started walking towards my vehicle.  i looked behind me in the sky and there was this big bright orange/yellowish ball that would slowly get bright and then slowly go dim.  sometimes 4-5 smaller balls would shoot off beside it and remain in a straight horizontal line next to the bigger object (not falling to earth).  then all of the little ones would return to the bigger ball. each time the light became brightest or basically became visible again it was followed by a far off rumble similar to hearing a far off thunderstorm.  this all lasted about 10 min and then never observed it again. when i first saw it i thought i was a shooting star or asteroid but it and all the other smaller lights were stationary.  when observing it i racked my brain thinking what it could be.  i thought maybe a helicopter doing search and rescue with a spotlight that i could only see when it faced my direction but that doesnt explain the far off explosion or rumble that i heard at least 3-4 times.  the object just never lit up again after about 15 min.
content.summary: Bright orange/yellowish light with 4-5 small lights branching off of it followed by distant rumbles like thunder

content.detailedDescription: I had been sitting out side for about an hour waiting to see some meteors when i thought i got a glimps of my first ones but it was strange and not what i at all expected. i just so happend to be on the phone with a friend when it happend the time was 10:42pm central, 8 huge dimlly lit orange balls of light in a v-shape traveled across the night sky silently west to east. at first i was excited that i had seen my first set of the meteors. but after several hours of watching meteors after my first incounter i soon relized that what i saw was no meteor at all. so i began to research and have found countless cases of this same craft, it almost appears to have some type of cloaking device. i feel that the 8 balls of light i saw were the under lights to a much larger craft. if any one eles saw this please comment i would reall like to know what it is that we are all seeing out here. this lights i saw were barley visable, and the meteors i saw look just like shooting starts witch was nothing like this. i watch the craft travle from right above me in my back yard to the east horizon untill it was no longer visable. it was only visable for abot 10 to fifteen seconds.
content.summary: Watching meteor shower when 8 huge orange translucent lights in a v-shape traveled across the sky silently from west to east.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my lady friend went to a fish bar to eat a meal, it was her birthday, midsummers day. 2002, she felt somthing and siad look up, pointing a little towards the east, we are on the south coast of england in a coastal port town of poole dorset. i looked at where she was pointing, and we both held our sternum, ( chest) as if it was tight, ?? not sure why,we watched 3 lights, a little bigger than a penny, and just a little smaller than a golf ball, they seem to dance arouun at high speed, back forth up down. stop, the 3 lights then i think went around each other, ?? anticlocwise, then above us flying out to sea, hovering , back and forth.. then with some noise,the jet fighters came along and the lights flash, took off upward.

hmm now that sort of manouvering (sorry spelling problems) surley would have liquified a human occupant ??, let alone the stucture, and close proximity of each other ??

come on white house ?? !! we know and feel the pressance of a higher inteligents, apart from the ((inteligents)) !!! hear on the surface, and well below the surface , not forgeting the <> who live under the oceans, & seas.

forget the data stored on disk, books etc (cave drawings) etc.

how about the data stored within the mind, whist we sleep.
when we sleep, it is not only to reccover from tiredness but to upload, ? and defrag, send energy back to energy,and receive a, well, reddyness for the next days events.

i was a member of the spr, society for the psychical reaserch. for a while aprox 20 miles away from where i live.

the mind (brain) is not just a ,,, organ,, bio electric data storage. etc.

i thin we all see and expirience the visitors well, energy influence, especially whilst we are in alpha, rarther than in rem. ??

have fun, but be carefull, through this expirience called life.

chri h near bournemouth dorset england, (36? miles from stone heinge.??
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Coming out of a seaside fish bar my lady said oh look, we both felt sternum trouble, above flying out to sea, hovering ,

content.detailedDescription: The date and time could be somewhat off.  i was about 11-13 when this event happened.  around evening time i was outside by myself throwing a football into the air.  i bought a new nerf football so i threw it as high as i could and ran to catch it.  this was a common thing that i did when i was bored.  i was not outside for more than 5 minutes when i threw it over the fence.  i was not allowed to leave my backyard at the time my parents were very strict about me going anywhere period.  thus why i was outside throwing a football into the air by myself and with no friends.  when i climbed the fence to look over and see where the football had landed there was a ship right there in front or me.  this ship was no more than 15-20 feet away from me and was almost touching the ground i couldn't see underneath the ship it was so low.  at first i was stunned and scared i froze up.  the ufo was so still it looked like a picture to me.  there was no motion at all.  reminded me of that painting by salvador dali with the clock melting it was so unreal.  i still had no idea what was happening i was in shock.  my eyes were frozen on this disc.  there was no activity and the area it  was in was relatively small there were buildings that really were not that far apart but this thing was almost touching them.  i'm talking millimeters here.  underneath this disc was a very very mild haze.  close to a desert when you see the heat waves but very hard to see.  heat was coming from this ship however i really dont want to call it that.  the day that this happened which im not entirely sure other than it was summer and it was warm out but not hot for it was in the evening.  this heat felt natural by that i mean like it was in my blood.  it was comfortable.  the best i can describe the heat that i felt is if i was sweating or hot the heat emitting from the ship would not make me sweat or feel anymore uncomfortable then what i already was.  as my eyes were fixated on this disc it was a very dull grey black and i mean extremely dull.  the black part of it which was mixed with the grey in no pattern at all reminded me of the shuttle in how when it reenters the earths atmosphere the heat turns it slightly black but very minor i personally believe that is what the disc had experienced from traveling to our planet and probably others as well.  the disc was one solid piece of metal.  no weld marks at all just one solid disc. that's it.  no windows doors or anything that i could see.  after staring at it for about 10-20 second i climbed down the fence looked at the ground and trying to catch up with my brain into what was happening.  i was trembling because i seriously believed that i was loosing my sanity.  i did this for about 5 seconds or so when i climbed back up the disc was gone.  one thing needs to be crystal clear i'm not a nut.  at the time i wasn't even really aware of ufo's other than the movies but i never not even once thought they were based off of anything.  that year which i'm not entirely sure on other than it was the mid to late 90's 96-98.  i supressed this memory until about 3 years ago.  it scared me to even talk about it to anyone and i didn't tell anyone until recently.  i know what i saw and there is no explanation for it other than what i have stated.  i was extremely close to this thing and it is proof to me that they exist.  if you believe great if you don't i don't care.  this is my roswell and to me the most important thing to happen in my life to date.  thanks for reading and remember that regardless of what others say about the subject it is real it is here and we need to embrace it rather than criticize it.
content.summary: Stationary no sound no lights dull silver black disc plain heat or some sort emitting from bottom of craft

content.detailedDescription: While viewing a rare meteor shower at 3 am a huge all black ship came out of nowhere right from the direction i was looking. it was freezing cold so i was walking backwards to my apartment trying to get a last glimpse of a shooting star when it happened. i was standing in the middle of my apartment parking lot and this ship flew slow and low right over my head. it made no noise whatsoever. it looked like 5 oval/egg shaped sections all hooked together with the one in the middle bigger than the ones on the sides. it formed a kind of chevron shape. it was almost like it just came out of some kind of cloaking mode if there really is such a thing because it wasn't there one second and then bam there it was flying over my head. i could see it clearly as it was so low and the parking lot lights showed it's outline. it was all black and smooth all over with no lights or sound. it flew so slow that i didn't know why it didn't fall down. i lost sight of it as it passed over me and then my 2 story apartment building. i ran inside and through to my bedroom which had a sliding glass door that looks out the same direction it was flying. it came out of the direction that i heard was the best for viewing the meteor shower. i think it was heading west. it headed towards thumb butte in prescott flying right over the safeway market on white spar road. that's when it was gone from my view. it flew a straight line for the time i was watching it. it came out fast and high up but in a blink of an eye it was right over my head low and slow. there was no mistaking what it was and i was totally sober as i was getting ready for gallbladder surgery in the coming weeks. it scared the crap out of me and excited me at the same time. my husband was out of town working and i didn't even tell him about it for at least 2 weeks. i can still see it perfectly. it seems like it was just yesterday when it happened. i now am very uncomfortable looking at the night sky and do not watch meteor showers any more. there is no doubt in my mind that we are not alone. and if some people think we are that they are just plain stupid. i will be 62 years old in 1 month so i am not some dumb girl with an overactive imagination. thanks for listening.
content.shape: Boomerang,   Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Chevron,   Egg,   Other
content.summary: Huge ship flew very slow and low just above the trees.
